question: How can I learn web development effectively?
true_answer: A structured plan for learning web development including resources and skills needed.

steps.description: Analyze and compile structured learning path

plan.current_objective: Create a structured learning path for web development

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Core skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript; Resources: online courses, tutorials, documentation.

steps.content: How can I learn web development effectively?
Creating initial plan to identify core skills and resources.
Decomposing task into identifying skills, finding resources, and creating a learning path.
Assigning core skills identification to researcher agent.
Searching for core web development skills.
Core skills found: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, server-side languages, databases.
Marking core skills identification as completed.
Assigning resource search to browser agent.
Searching for online resources such as courses, tutorials, and documentation.
Resources found: freeCodeCamp, Codecademy, MDN Web Docs, W3Schools.
Compiling findings into a structured learning path.
To learn web development effectively, focus on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript first. Use resources like freeCodeCamp and MDN Web Docs. Progress to server-side languages and databases.
